query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races) as total_races,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races WHERE race_date = CURRENT_DATE) as today_races,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM odds) as total_odds,
  (SELECT MAX(scraped_at) FROM odds) as latest_odds_time,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM race_results) as total_results

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3DrEtHdFZh6aMXG.39472e580f22 --database VsJD2HZhYTnzfPMAHp7zc2 --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races) as total_races,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races WHERE race_date = CURRENT_DATE) as today_races,
